materials.raw_text:
La (Lanthanum): 20 g 
 Mg (Magnesium): 8 g 
 Pr (Praseodymium): 60 g 
 Sc (Scandium): 16 g 
 Si (Silicon): 80 g

sourcing.instructions:
La (Lanthanum): Purchase from chemical supply companies or online suppliers. 
 Mg (Magnesium): Available at metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Pr (Praseodymium): Obtain from rare earth suppliers. 
 Sc (Scandium): Available through specialized metal suppliers. 
 Si (Silicon): Buy from electronics or chemical supply stores.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
2. Use a diamond saw or grinder to cut the sample into the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
3. Sand the edges and surfaces to smooth out any rough areas.
4. Optionally, apply a sealing coat to enhance surface protection.
